title: There is ZERO point to ARURF with so much damage in the game...
body: It doesn't even take a full round of abilities to kill someone... what's the point of low cooldowns???

replies.body:
one shotting isn't fun....

urf was fun because of the fun extended fights, going back and forth etc, 

this is just assassin mode and it's lame.

rose-tinted glasses.

URF was always a moronic shitfest of people being permastunned by brand, deleted by a katarina who traverses the map by ulting people, machinegun karthus, ect.
right, but it took more than one combo for brand to kill you. That's what made it fun....
